name: beautiful farm animals for all kids - free
name_original: beautiful farm animals for all kids - free
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8). This application is composed of two different sets:

first game:
In this game, your child will be keen to show and also skilful. Targets appear and you must hit by throwing a dart. Please do not use all your darts. To win the level your child should extend the score to beat. Playable one or two players. When a level is successful image of an animal farm becomes available in the image gallery.

second game:
In this game your child flies a helicopter. The goal is to collect the blue balls without hitting opponents. To find these blue balls your child needs to use radar. This is both a game of skill and speed. Playable one or two players. When a level is successful image of an animal farm becomes available in the image gallery.

Characteristics :
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of farm animals.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 images of farm animals to be released.

the following languages ​​are available:
Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malaysian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
